title: A Litle Love
lyrics: Great ness as you. smal lest as me. you show me what is deep as sea a little love, little kiss a litlle hug, little gift all of little something .these are our memories. you make me cry make me smile make me feel that love is true you always stand by my side i don't want to say goodbye. you make me cry make me smile make me feel the joy of love oh kissing you ..........thank you for all the love you always give to me. oh I love you Yes I do   I always do
